column4: Hi everybody, i have few questions, hope im in the right place
which Ubuntu distrubution will be best for an Intel Q6600 CPU with ASUS P5B motherboard/?
which Ubuntu distrubution will be best for an Intel Q6600 CPU with ASUS P5B motherboard/?
which Ubuntu distrubution will be best for an Intel Q6600 CPU with ASUS P5B motherboard/?
Ubuntu or Kubuntu depending on your preferences.
Flash and other propietary softwares are a pain to get working on 64bits. If you dont have a good reason to run it, I suggest you stick with 32bits.
